#summary Instructions to build with Maven

= Introduction =

!BigBlueButton will soon by default build with Maven. Until then you can help us test out the maven integration by following these instructions.


= Details =

  # Install !BigBlueButton on your server.
  # Checkout the source.
  # cd to bigbluebutton/.
  # run:
{{{
mvn clean install -Dmaven.test.skip=true
}}}
  # Report errors to [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev bigbluebutton-dev]
